features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新主要针对系统进行了优化，推荐您进行更新
• 优化部分场景横屏使用体验
• 优化部分场景智慧互联功能使用体验
• 合入安卓2025年9月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2025/9
• 优化系统，提升使用体验。
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持
Dear user, this update mainly enhances the system performance. Update to enjoy the improvements
• Optimizes the user experience in landscape orientation in some scenarios
• Optimizes the user experience of Honor Connect in some scenarios

• Android security patch (Sep 2025) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about Honor Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2025/9
• Enhances the system to optimize the user experience.

1. Installing this update will not affect your personal data, but it is still recommended to back up your data before updating 2. Discover more information on product features in Tips 3. If you encounter any issue during use, please get support by going to My Honor or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us
